attributes.action: Allow children who goes to nursery to have priority when attached to a school
attributes.additional_details: Many parents feel they are no longer in control of there childrens education. I myself feel very effected by this as my daughter is at a nursery and because i dont live in that area i may have to send her to a school away from friends she will have made and to a school i don't feel is going to be the best road for my daughter to get the best education in my opinion
attributes.background: I think its really important for parents to have some authority when choosing education for there children as all parents have different views and opinions on were they want there children to go to school and  would make it ideal for children to have priority when going to a attached nursery
